title: Step 58

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-mouth div selector should have a border-color property set to black transparent transparent transparent.
Your .cat-mouth div selector should have a border-radius property set to 190%/190px 150px 0 0.

description: You are going to make the two mouth lines into an elliptical shape. So, give the .cat-mouth div selector a border color of black transparent transparent transparent and a border radius of 190%/190px 150px 0 0.
